summary: Completed comprehensive testing of interactive ebook application. Found critical backend database issue preventing favorite functionality and chapter creation. Frontend navigation and core features working well.

critical_bugs.impact: Blocks all new chapter creation and favorite functionality
critical_bugs.error_message: Could not find the 'favorite' column of 'chapters' in the schema cache

critical_bugs.issue: Favorite API will fail due to missing database column
critical_bugs.impact: Users cannot mark chapters as favorites

ui_bugs.issue: Shows loading spinner but no saved chapters displayed
ui_bugs.note: May be related to backend favorite column issue

ui_bugs.issue: Edit button click blocked by overlay interception
ui_bugs.error: Element intercepts pointer events - backdrop overlay blocking clicks

ui_bugs.issue: TOC button clicks but content modal not found

working_features.status: Working - Home and Library options found and functional
Working - Loads with interactive hotspots visible

passed_tests: Homepage loads with correct branding and stats
Explore Demo button navigates to reader
Demo Content tab shows sample chapters
Demo chapter cards are clickable and open reader
Header menu contains Home and Library options
Header menu Home option navigates back to homepage
Reader displays interactive content with hotspots
Backend API root endpoint responds correctly
Backend image generation models endpoint works
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Add 'favorite' column to Supabase 'chapters' table schema. This is blocking chapter creation and favorite functionality. Also fix overlay interception issue in Topic Editor that prevents Edit button clicks.

success_percentage.backend: 60% - Core read operations work, but create/favorite operations fail due to database schema
success_percentage.frontend: 80% - Navigation and display work well, but some interactive features blocked by UI issues
